translations: 使……缓慢移动，使……缓慢滚动（trundle的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The truck was trundling along the escarp we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  of the Zambesi valley.
sentences.translation: 卡车正沿着赞比西山谷的悬崖缓慢行驶。

sentences.sentence: Our bus turned another corner and started trundling along the river.
sentences.translation: 我们乘坐的巴士又拐了一个弯，开始沿着河流慢慢行驶。

sentences.sentence: The truck was trundling along the escarp we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  of the Zambesi valley .
sentences.translation: 卡车沿着赞比西山谷的绝壁缓缓行进。
